2361.verse: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].

2362.verse: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.

2363.verse: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.

2364.verse: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish.

2365.verse: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses?"

2366.verse: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses."

2368.verse: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.

2369.verse: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.

2370.verse: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign,

2371.verse: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.

2372.verse: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed."

2373.verse: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]

2374.verse: And ease for me my task

2375.verse: And untie the knot from my tongue

2376.verse: That they may understand my speech.

2377.verse: And appoint for me a minister from my family -

2380.verse: And let him share my task

2381.verse: That we may exalt You much

2383.verse: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."

2384.verse: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses.

2385.verse: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
